title: Volley Head
description: Game multiplayer competitive dimana terdapat 2 tim yang memiliki masing-masing 2 pemain. Tim tersebut akan berhadapan satu sama lain dengan permainan bola voli. Tim yang mendapat target poin terlebih dahulu akan memenangkan pertandingan.

title: Blue Umbrella Guy
description: Game about adventure of a guy who always bring a blue umbrella.

title: Syaiton Slayer
description: Game survival, dimana player harus mempertahankan lilin agar tidak tersentuh syaiton, dan harus menjaga diri dengan sarung sakti, agar tidak kesurupan karena terkena syaiton.

title: Escape From Mutant
description: Game about a helping a Survivor to escape from Mutant.

title: DxA: Devil x Angel
description: Game tells the story of a forbidden love between a devil named Astaroth and an angel named Mareia. They were some of a flawed creation, of which Astaroth was an overly good demon, and Mareia an Angel who was too rebellious and reckless. Because of this they were punished in the afterlife prison which is where they first met. There they intend to get out of the prison and find a way to live freely together. This game is a side scrolling solo player platform game that relies on the focus of the players. This game has 1 control and 2 top and bottom obstacles that must be passed.

title: Panjat Pinang Chill
description: Game multiplayer tentang lomba panjat pinang yang dimainkan oleh 2 orang dan harus mengumpulkan skor lebih besar dari pemain lain

title: Binar Car Rental
description: Landing page website for rental car company.

title: Thrifty Shop
description: E-Commerce website that is intended as a platform for buying and selling used second hand clothes with interactions between sellers and buyers.
